location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 12: William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Officials at Bussora [Basra], to [John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire]

mods.abstract: This letter has no stated recipient, but it would appear to be addressed to John Beaumont, Resident at Bushire. The letter discusses the expected arrival of Colonel James Capper at Bussora [Basra], accompanied by Major Thompson and Mr Dighton, with important messages from the Court of Directors for their settlements in India. The letter states that Capper left England on 2 September.
